metadata.title: Tuesday, 19th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)how many kilometres of the roads in Sesheke Parliamentary Constituency are earmarked for street lighting;
(b)when the first phase of the exercise will be completed;
(c)when the second phase will commence; and
(d)when the whole exercise will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development when the Government will electrify Chief Ingwe’s Palace in Kasempa District.
Minister of Transport, Works, supply and Communication
parts: (a)when construction of the road from Kalabo to the Angolan border via Sikongo will commence;
(b)what the name of the contractor working on the road is; and

(c)what the duration of the project is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 26/01: under consideration): (Mr Mwanza). Heads 26/02, 26/03, 26/04, 51/01, 51/02, 51/03, 51/04, 51/05, 51/06, 51/07, 51/08, 51/09, 51/10, 34/01, 27/01, 27/02, 27/03, 27/04, 27/05, 27/06, 46/01, 46/02, 46/05, 46/06, 46/07, 46/08, 46/09, 46/10, 46/11, 46/12, 46/13, 46/14, 46/15, 46/16, 46/17, 46/18 and 46/19 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 26    -    Ministry of Information and Broadcasting Head 51    -    Ministry of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication Head 34    -    Human Rights Commission Head 27    -    Public Service Management Division Head 46    -    Ministry of Health
